description:
Debug Network Faster & Smarter with Proxyman

Proxyman is a high-performance Windows app, which enables developers to capture, inspect, and manipulate HTTP/HTTPS requests/responses with ease.
‚ú® Features
- Start Google Chrome, Firefox, Edge and Brave with Proxyman settings. No need to install or set a Proxy manually. It just works.
- Restore to Previous HTTP/HTTPS Proxy when Proxyman is closed. Useful if youre using other proxy at the same time.
- Manual Setup now can capture Go network requests, like net/http, fasthttp, resty, gorequest, req, grequests

üêû Bugs
- Fixed: Unable to delete/reset Proxyman CA certificate
- Fixed: Loop issue when using Proxyman with Nuxt
